description:
Public transportation, including public bus and massive
rapid transit (MRT), plays a critical role for people’s daily
life in the large cities such as Singapore, Hong Kong and
London. This module introduces fundamental concepts,
tangible operational strategies and planning as well as
deign principles for urban public transportation systems.
The major topics include urban public transportation
organizational models and contract structures,
performance assessment and data collection methods,
ridership forecasting, public transportation assignment
models, vehicle and crew scheduling, high ridership
corridor operational strategies, network design principles,
introduction to MRT service operations and planning.
title: Urban Public Transportation Systems
